Paragraph: The oxidation and reduction potentials and the electrochemical band gaps ( E g EC ) of the polymers are summarized in Table 1.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The oxidation and reduction potentials and the electrochemical band gaps ( E g EC ) of the polymers are summarized in Table 1.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| oxidation potentials |
| reduction potentials |
| electrochemical band gaps (Eg EC) |

The three "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "oxidation potentials", "reduction potentials", and "electrochemical band gaps (Eg EC)". They are mentioned as the properties of the polymers that are summarized in Table 1.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| electrochemical band gaps (Eg EC) |

The only valid "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "electrochemical band gaps (Eg EC)". The other two entities, "oxidation potentials" and "reduction potentials", are not clearly referring to material properties in this context. They are mentioned as properties of the polymers, but they are not defined or explained in the paragraph, so it is not clear what they refer to. Therefore, they should not be included in the list of material properties.
